Description: Number of parallel processes in cutout preparation

Values: Convention is to name cutouts like ``<region>-<year>-<source>`` (e.g. ``europe-2013-era5``).
Description: Directory to write cutout data to. The user may specify multiple cutouts under configuration ``atlite: cutouts:``. Reference is used in configuration ``renewable: {technology}: cutout:``

Source of the reanalysis weather dataset (e.g. `ERA5 <https://www.ecmwf.int/en/forecasts/datasets/reanalysis-datasets/era5>`_ or `SARAH-2 <https://wui.cmsaf.eu/safira/action/viewDoiDetails?acronym=SARAH_V002>`_)
Range of longitudes to download weather data for.
Range of latitudes to download weather data for.
Range of years to download weather data for.
